page.title: 13KINGSWOOD: CHILDREN'S VIEW
page.content: I like Kingswood because: it isn't noisy at night, it has very nice big houses with big drives, you can go for long walks, it has a playing field with swings, it has pretty gardens, it has a stream where I catch fish, it has lots of farms and places to walk and play, it has a sweet shop, it is a peaceful village, it has got a good scrambling course in a field, it has a stream with ducks. There is not much traffic and nor much vandalism. I like the space round our village hall where we can ride our bikes. We like special occasions in Kingswood like jumble sales, discos or races. I like the school best. I don't like liter or dog dirt on the pavement. I wish Kingswood had more shops, especially a toy shop and an ice cream shop. I wish we had a swimming pool, a library, a cave or a great big ruin of a castle.
